728955f-b.text:
(1)
37 Howard Avenue, east side, seuth of Leuis Street, showing the Jchn Martin residence. Here Maxim Gerky, womld renewned Ruasian author, wrote his famous novel "Mother' while staying with the Martins, in 1906 (see "The Sun", Dec. 3, 1937). The residence at one time belenged to Henry Sedley (1874 and 1898
maps).
June 18, 1926
P.L. Sperr
(E)
The rear ef the house.
June 18, 1926.
P.L. Sperr
(3)
The rear ef the house, leoking north.
June 18, 1926.
P.L. Sperr
728955f-b.folder: Howard Avenue & Louis Street, Staten Island, NY
